sqlReaderQuery.value:
select 
LocationNumber AS SITE_CONTENT_ID
,'SiteContent' AS B_CLASSNAME
,[LocationNumber]
,[ExteriorPhoto]
,[FlyerLink]
,[Promotion1Image]  
      ,[Promotion1URL]
      ,[Promotion2URL]
      ,[Promotion2Image]
      ,[ScheduleApptURL]
      ,[AlternateWebsiteURL]
      ,convert(nvarchar(128),WebsiteURL) as WebsiteURL
	  ,convert(nvarchar(128),[BusinessDescription]) as BusinessDescription
      ,[BusinessLongDescription]
      ,convert(nvarchar(128),BusinessShortDescription) as BusinessShortDescription
	  ,convert(nvarchar(128),[BusinessName]) as BusinessName
      ,[ContentLanguage]
      ,B_CREDATE
      ,B_CREATOR
      ,B_UPDATOR
      ,FP_SITE_ID
      ,FS_SITE_ID
      ,B_DELETETYPE
      ,B_DELETEDATE
      ,B_DELETEAUTHOR
      ,B_DELETEOPERATION
FROM [Retail].[DACIncrementalSiteContent_INC]

SELECT 
      B_CLASSNAME
      ,SITE_HOURS_TYPE
      ,DAY_OF_WEEK
      
	  ,CASE
    WHEN Cast (START_TIME as nvarchar(10)) = 'Closed' Then ''
	Else Cast (START_TIME as nvarchar(10)) end as Starttm
	,CASE
    WHEN Cast (END_TIME as nvarchar(10))='' Then ''
	Else Cast (END_TIME as nvarchar(10)) end as endtm

      ,FP_SITE
      ,FS_SITE
      ,B_CREDATE
      ,B_CREATOR
      ,B_UPDATOR
	,SiteDefaultHours as Key1
      ,BUSINESS_STATE
  FROM [Retail].[DACIncrementalSiteDefaultHours_INC]

SELECT 
    'SiteSpecialHour' AS B_CLASSNAME,
    SPH_Date,
    SPH_StartTime,
    SPH_Endtime,
    SPH_State,
    FP_SITE,
    FS_SITE,
    B_CREDATE,
    B_CREATOR,
    B_UPDATOR,
    SiteSpecialHours AS key1
FROM Retail.DACIncrementalSiteSpecialHours_INC

DECLARE @RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT DECIMAL
EXECUTE [dbo].[GET_NEW_LOADID]
@RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT OUTPUT
,@P_DATA_LOCATION_NAME = 'Retail_SiteMaster'
,@P_PROGRAM_NAME = 'RetailSiteDataLoad'
,@P_LOAD_DESCRIPTION = 'RetailSiteDataLoad'
,@P_USERNAME = 'semadmin'
SELECT @RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT AS RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT

SELECT 
'Site' AS B_CLASSNAME,
GETDATE() AS B_CREDATE,
GETDATE() AS B_UPDDATE,
'semadmin' AS B_CREATOR,
'SSMASTER_RDC' AS B_PUBID,
site_id AS B_SOURCEID,
operational_status AS OPERATIONAL_STATUS,
type AS TYPE,
account_num AS ACCOUNT_NUMBER,
ship_to_num AS SHIP_TO_NUM,
model AS MODEL,
version AS VERSION,
time_zone AS TIME_ZONE,
local_currency_code  AS LOCAL_CURRENCY_CODE,
raw_phone AS RAW_PHONE,
raw_cs_phone AS RAW_CS_PHONE,
raw_fax AS RAW_FAX,
sms_code AS SMS_CODE,
soft_open_date AS SOFT_OPEN_DATE,
grand_open_date AS GRAND_OPEN_DATE,
close_date AS CLOSE_DATE,
area_unit_of_measure AS AREA_UNIT_OF_MEASURE,
building_sqft AS BUILDING_SQFT,
warehouse_sqft AS WAREHOUSE_SQFT,
showroom_sqft AS SHOWROOM_SQFT,
office_sqft AS OFFICE_SQFT,
num_of_dock_doors AS NUM_OF_DOCK_DOORS,
retail_system_num AS RETAIL_SYSTEM_NUM, 
enterprise_store_num AS ENTERPRISE_STORE_NUM,
prospect_id  AS PROSPECT_ID,
CAST(dma_id AS DECIMAL(17,0)) AS DMA_ID, 
dma AS DMA,
msa_id AS MSA_ID,
msa AS MSA,
market AS MARKET,
region AS REGION,
domestic_category AS DOMESTIC_CATEGORY,
country_category AS COUNTRY_CATEGORY,
CAST(ecom_fulfiller_flag AS BIT) AS ECOM_FULFILLER_FLAG,
active_flag,
activity_type ,
'SOFT_DELETE' as B_DELETETYPE,
getdate() as B_DELETEDATE,
'Semadmin' as B_DELETEAUTHOR,
cast(newid() as uniqueidentifier) as B_DELETEOPERATION
FROM Retail.v_Site_WareHouse_inc
where upper(operational_status)='INACTIVE'

SELECT 
'Site' AS B_CLASSNAME,
GETDATE() AS B_CREDATE,
GETDATE() AS B_UPDDATE,
'semadmin' AS B_CREATOR,
'SSMASTER_RDC' AS B_PUBID,
site_id AS B_SOURCEID,
operational_status AS OPERATIONAL_STATUS,
type AS TYPE,
account_num AS ACCOUNT_NUMBER,
ship_to_num AS SHIP_TO_NUM,
model AS MODEL,
version AS VERSION,
time_zone AS TIME_ZONE,
local_currency_code  AS LOCAL_CURRENCY_CODE,
raw_phone AS RAW_PHONE,
raw_cs_phone AS RAW_CS_PHONE,
raw_fax AS RAW_FAX,
sms_code AS SMS_CODE,
soft_open_date AS SOFT_OPEN_DATE,
grand_open_date AS GRAND_OPEN_DATE,
close_date AS CLOSE_DATE,
area_unit_of_measure AS AREA_UNIT_OF_MEASURE,
building_sqft AS BUILDING_SQFT,
warehouse_sqft AS WAREHOUSE_SQFT,
showroom_sqft AS SHOWROOM_SQFT,
office_sqft AS OFFICE_SQFT,
num_of_dock_doors AS NUM_OF_DOCK_DOORS,
retail_system_num AS RETAIL_SYSTEM_NUM, 
enterprise_store_num AS ENTERPRISE_STORE_NUM,
prospect_id  AS PROSPECT_ID,
CAST(dma_id AS DECIMAL(17,0)) AS DMA_ID, 
dma AS DMA,
msa_id AS MSA_ID,
msa AS MSA,
market AS MARKET,
region AS REGION,
domestic_category AS DOMESTIC_CATEGORY,
country_category AS COUNTRY_CATEGORY,
CAST(ecom_fulfiller_flag AS BIT) AS ECOM_FULFILLER_FLAG,
B_DELETETYPE,
B_DELETEDATE,
B_DELETEAUTHOR,
B_DELETEOPERATION,
active_flag,
activity_type ,
'SOFT_DELETE' as B_DELETETYPE,
getdate() as B_DELETEDATE,
'Semadmin' as B_DELETEAUTHOR,
cast(newid() as uniqueidentifier) as B_DELETEOPERATION
FROM Retail.v_Site_WareHouse_inc
where upper(operational_status)='INACTIVE'

select distinct B_CLASSNAME, B_CREDATE, B_UPDDATE, B_CREATOR, B_PUBID, B_SOURCEID, OPERATIONAL_STATUS, TYPE, ACCOUNT_NUMBER, 
SHIP_TO_NUM, MODEL, VERSION, TIME_ZONE, LOCAL_CURRENCY_CODE, RAW_PHONE, RAW_CS_PHONE, RAW_FAX, SMS_CODE, SOFT_OPEN_DATE,
 GRAND_OPEN_DATE, CLOSE_DATE, AREA_UNIT_OF_MEASURE, BUILDING_SQFT, WAREHOUSE_SQFT, SHOWROOM_SQFT, OFFICE_SQFT, NUM_OF_DOCK_DOORS,
  RETAIL_SYSTEM_NUM, ENTERPRISE_STORE_NUM, F_GOOGLE_ID as LOCATION_NUMBER, PROSPECT_ID, DMA_ID, DMA, MSA_ID, MSA, MARKET, REGION, DOMESTIC_CATEGORY,
   COUNTRY_CATEGORY, FP_SUPPORTING_WAREHOUSE, 
FS_SUPPORTING_WAREHOUSE,
unit,
'SOFT_DELETE' as B_DELETETYPE,
getdate() as B_DELETEDATE,
'Semadmin' as B_DELETEAUTHOR,
cast(newid() as uniqueidentifier) as B_DELETEOPERATION
--change_type, record_insert_date, record_update_date
from retail.v_Site_Storemaster_incremental
where upper(operational_status) ='INACTIVE'
and CLOSE_DATE <= CURRENT_DATE

select distinct B_CLASSNAME, B_CREDATE, B_UPDDATE, B_CREATOR, B_PUBID, B_SOURCEID, OPERATIONAL_STATUS, TYPE, ACCOUNT_NUMBER, 
SHIP_TO_NUM, MODEL, VERSION, TIME_ZONE, LOCAL_CURRENCY_CODE, RAW_PHONE, RAW_CS_PHONE, RAW_FAX, SMS_CODE, SOFT_OPEN_DATE,
 GRAND_OPEN_DATE, CLOSE_DATE, AREA_UNIT_OF_MEASURE, BUILDING_SQFT, WAREHOUSE_SQFT, SHOWROOM_SQFT, OFFICE_SQFT, NUM_OF_DOCK_DOORS,
  RETAIL_SYSTEM_NUM, ENTERPRISE_STORE_NUM, F_GOOGLE_ID, PROSPECT_ID, DMA_ID, DMA, MSA_ID, MSA, MARKET, REGION, DOMESTIC_CATEGORY, 
  COUNTRY_CATEGORY, FP_SUPPORTING_WAREHOUSE, FS_SUPPORTING_WAREHOUSE, 
change_type, record_insert_date, record_update_date,Unit
from retail.v_Site_Storemaster_incremental
where upper(operational_status) ='INACTIVE'
--and CLOSE_DATE <= CURRENT_DATE

select HS_OPC_TRACKING_ID,B_CLASSNAME,B_CREDATE,B_UPDDATE,B_CREATOR,B_PUBID,B_SOURCEID,OPERATION_ID,
ltrim(PRIMARY_PROFIT_CENTER,'0') as PRIMARY_PROFIT_CENTER,
--ltrim(PRIMARY_PROFIT_CENTER,'0') as PRIMARY_PROFIT_CENTER
ERP_DATABASE_NAME,ERP_SYSTEM_NAME,EFFECTIVE_START_DATE,EFFECTIVE_END_DATE,LEGACY_LOCATION_ID,SITE_NAME,COMP_FLAG,ENTERPRISE_FLAG,TRAFFIC_SYSTEM_ID,LIC_TERRITORY,TUA_EXPIRATION_DATE,NOTES,OS_ID,OS_LOCATION_ID,SITE_RAW_ADDR_LINE1,SITE_RAW_ADDR_LINE2,SITE_RAW_CITY,SITE_RAW_STATE,SITE_RAW_STATE_CODE,SITE_RAW_POSTAL_CODE,SITE_RAW_COUNTRY,SITE_RAW_COUNTRY_CODE,
SITE_RAW_LATITUDE,SITE_RAW_LONGITUDE,--F_LEGAL_ENTITY_ID,
 Salesmanager1 as Sales_Manager1,
	 Salesmanager2 as Sales_Manager2,
	 Salesmanager3 as Sales_Manager3,
	 Store_manager,Status,
FP_SITE_ID,FS_SITE_ID,
 FP_LEGAL_ENTITY,
	 FS_LEGAL_ENTITY,
	 'SOFT_DELETE' as B_DELETETYPE,
getdate() as B_DELETEDATE,
'Semadmin' as B_DELETEAUTHOR,
cast(newid() as uniqueidentifier) as B_DELETEOPERATION
	  from (
SELECT 
    cast(newid() as uniqueidentifier) HS_OPC_TRACKING_ID,
    B_CLASSNAME,
	B_CREDATE,
	B_UPDDATE,
	B_CREATOR,
	B_PUBID,
	B_SOURCEID,
	 operation_id AS OPERATION_ID,
	 primary_profit_center AS PRIMARY_PROFIT_CENTER,
	 erp_database_name AS ERP_DATABASE_NAME,
	 erp_system_name AS ERP_SYSTEM_NAME,
	 effective_start_date AS EFFECTIVE_START_DATE,
	 effective_end_date AS EFFECTIVE_END_DATE,
	 legacy_location_id AS LEGACY_LOCATION_ID,
	 site_name AS SITE_NAME,
	 CAST(comp_flag AS BIT) AS COMP_FLAG,
	 CAST(enterprise_flag AS BIT) AS ENTERPRISE_FLAG,
	 traffic_system_id AS TRAFFIC_SYSTEM_ID,
	 lic_territory AS LIC_TERRITORY,
	 tua_expiration_date AS TUA_EXPIRATION_DATE,
	 notes AS NOTES,
	 os_id AS OS_ID,
	 os_location_id AS OS_LOCATION_ID,
	 raw_addr_line1 AS SITE_RAW_ADDR_LINE1,
	 raw_addr_line2 AS SITE_RAW_ADDR_LINE2,
	 raw_city AS SITE_RAW_CITY,
	 raw_state AS SITE_RAW_STATE,
	 raw_state_code AS SITE_RAW_STATE_CODE,
	 raw_postal_code AS SITE_RAW_POSTAL_CODE,
	 raw_country AS SITE_RAW_COUNTRY,
	 raw_country_code AS SITE_RAW_COUNTRY_CODE,
	 raw_latitude AS SITE_RAW_LATITUDE,
	 raw_longitude AS SITE_RAW_LONGITUDE,
	 --legal_entity_id AS F_LEGAL_ENTITY_ID,
	 FP_SITE_ID,
	 FS_SITE_ID ,
	 FP_LEGAL_ENTITY,
	 FS_LEGAL_ENTITY,
	 Salesmanager1,
	 Salesmanager2,
	 Salesmanager3,
	 Store_manager,
	 status,
     ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY B_SOURCEID ORDER BY effective_start_date DESC, effective_end_date asc) AS rn     
FROM Retail.v_hs_opc_tracking_incremental)a
where rn=1
and upper(Status)='INACTIVE'
--and effective_end_date <= CURRENT_DATE

WITH RankedRecords AS (
    SELECT 
        cast(newid() as uniqueidentifier) AS WH_LE_TRACKING_ID,
        site_id as B_sourceid,
        'WarehouseLegalEntityTracking' as B_CLASSNAME,
        GETDATE() AS B_CREDATE,
        GETDATE() AS B_UPDDATE,
        'semadmin' AS B_CREATOR,
        CAST(effective_start_date AS DATE) AS EFFECTIVE_START_DATE,
        site_name AS SITE_NAME,
        notes AS NOTES,
        legacy_location_id AS LEGACY_LOCATION_ID,
        os_id AS OS_ID,
        os_location_id AS OS_LOCATION_ID,
        raw_addr_line1 AS SITE_RAW_ADDR_LINE1,
        raw_addr_line2 AS SITE_RAW_ADDR_LINE2,
        raw_city AS SITE_RAW_CITY,
        raw_state AS SITE_RAW_STATE,
        raw_state_code AS SITE_RAW_STATE_CODE,
        raw_postal_code AS SITE_RAW_POSTAL_CODE,
        raw_country AS SITE_RAW_COUNTRY,
        raw_country_code AS SITE_RAW_COUNTRY_CODE,
        raw_latitude AS SITE_RAW_LATITUDE,
        raw_longitude AS SITE_RAW_LONGITUDE,
        --legal_entity_id AS F_LEGAL_ENTITY_ID,
        'SSMASTER_RDC' AS B_PUBID,
        'SSMASTER_RDC' AS FP_SITE_ID,
        site_id AS FS_SITE_ID,
        'SSMASTER_RDC' AS FP_LEGAL_ENTITY,
        site_id AS FS_LEGAL_ENTITY,
        status,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (
            PARTITION BY site_id 
            ORDER BY 
                CASE 
                    WHEN status = 'Active' THEN 1 
                    WHEN status = 'Inactive' THEN 2 
                    ELSE 3 
                END,
                effective_start_date DESC
        ) as rn
    FROM Retail.v_wh_le_tracking_inc
)
SELECT 
    WH_LE_TRACKING_ID,
    B_sourceid,
    B_CLASSNAME,
    B_CREDATE,
    B_UPDDATE,
    B_CREATOR,
    EFFECTIVE_START_DATE,
    SITE_NAME,
    NOTES,
    LEGACY_LOCATION_ID,
    OS_ID,
    OS_LOCATION_ID,
    SITE_RAW_ADDR_LINE1,
    SITE_RAW_ADDR_LINE2,
    SITE_RAW_CITY,
    SITE_RAW_STATE,
    SITE_RAW_STATE_CODE,
    SITE_RAW_POSTAL_CODE,
    SITE_RAW_COUNTRY,
    SITE_RAW_COUNTRY_CODE,
    SITE_RAW_LATITUDE,
    SITE_RAW_LONGITUDE,
    --F_LEGAL_ENTITY_ID,
    B_PUBID,
    FP_SITE_ID,
    FS_SITE_ID,
    FP_LEGAL_ENTITY,
    FS_LEGAL_ENTITY,
    status,
    'SOFT_DELETE' as B_DELETETYPE,
getdate() as B_DELETEDATE,
'Semadmin' as B_DELETEAUTHOR,
cast(newid() as uniqueidentifier) as B_DELETEOPERATION
FROM RankedRecords
WHERE rn = 1
and upper(status)='INACTIVE'
;

scripts.text:
DELETE ah FROM Retail.RSA_Assignment_HIST ah
INNER JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT RSA_ID, AssociateID   FROM Retail.RSA_Assignment_Inc_UKG_VW    WHERE active_flag = 0) src 
ON ah.RSA_ID = src.RSA_ID 
AND ah.AssociateID = src.AssociateID

WITH RankedRecords AS (
    SELECT 
        cast(newid() as uniqueidentifier) AS WH_LE_TRACKING_ID,
        site_id as B_sourceid,
        'WarehouseLegalEntityTracking' as B_CLASSNAME,
        GETDATE() AS B_CREDATE,
        GETDATE() AS B_UPDDATE,
        'semadmin' AS B_CREATOR,
        CAST(effective_start_date AS DATE) AS EFFECTIVE_START_DATE,
        site_name AS SITE_NAME,
        notes AS NOTES,
        legacy_location_id AS LEGACY_LOCATION_ID,
        os_id AS OS_ID,
        os_location_id AS OS_LOCATION_ID,
        raw_addr_line1 AS SITE_RAW_ADDR_LINE1,
        raw_addr_line2 AS SITE_RAW_ADDR_LINE2,
        raw_city AS SITE_RAW_CITY,
        raw_state AS SITE_RAW_STATE,
        raw_state_code AS SITE_RAW_STATE_CODE,
        raw_postal_code AS SITE_RAW_POSTAL_CODE,
        raw_country AS SITE_RAW_COUNTRY,
        raw_country_code AS SITE_RAW_COUNTRY_CODE,
        raw_latitude AS SITE_RAW_LATITUDE,
        raw_longitude AS SITE_RAW_LONGITUDE,
        legal_entity_id AS F_LEGAL_ENTITY_ID,
        'SSMASTER_RDC' AS B_PUBID,
        'SSMASTER_RDC' AS FP_SITE_ID,
        site_id AS FS_SITE_ID,
        status,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (
            PARTITION BY site_id 
            ORDER BY 
                CASE 
                    WHEN status = 'Active' THEN 1 
                    WHEN status = 'Inactive' THEN 2 
                    ELSE 3 
                END,
                effective_start_date DESC
        ) as rn
    FROM Retail.v_wh_le_tracking_inc
)
SELECT 
    WH_LE_TRACKING_ID,
    B_sourceid,
    B_CLASSNAME,
    B_CREDATE,
    B_UPDDATE,
    B_CREATOR,
    EFFECTIVE_START_DATE,
    SITE_NAME,
    NOTES,
    LEGACY_LOCATION_ID,
    OS_ID,
    OS_LOCATION_ID,
    SITE_RAW_ADDR_LINE1,
    SITE_RAW_ADDR_LINE2,
    SITE_RAW_CITY,
    SITE_RAW_STATE,
    SITE_RAW_STATE_CODE,
    SITE_RAW_POSTAL_CODE,
    SITE_RAW_COUNTRY,
    SITE_RAW_COUNTRY_CODE,
    SITE_RAW_LATITUDE,
    SITE_RAW_LONGITUDE,
    F_LEGAL_ENTITY_ID,
    B_PUBID,
    FP_SITE_ID,
    FS_SITE_ID,
    status
FROM RankedRecords
WHERE rn = 1
and upper(status)='ACTIVE'
;
